  bool ScientificMatcher::match(StringSegment& segment, ParsedNumber& result, UErrorCode& status) const {
      // Only accept scientific notation after the mantissa.
      if (!result.seenNumber()) {
          return false;
      }
+

+     if (0 != (result.flags & FLAG_HAS_EXPONENT)) {
+         return false;
